00030 Imc::Imc()
00031    : _block_length(0), _do_imc(false), _processed_some_frames(false)
00032 {
00033 }

00035 Imc::~Imc()

00039 // begin the coarse graining process
00040 // here the data structures are prepared to handle all the data
00041 void Imc::Initialize()
00042 {
00043     // do some output
00044     if(_do_imc)
00045             cout << "begin to calculate inverse monte carlo parameters\n";
00046     else
00047             cout << "begin to calculate distribution functions\n";
00048     cout << "# of bonded interactions: " << _bonded.size() << endl;
00049     cout << "# of non-bonded interactions: " << _nonbonded.size() << endl;
00050 
00051     if ( _bonded.size()+_nonbonded.size() == 0 )
00052             throw std::runtime_error("No interactions defined in options xml-file - nothing to be done");
00053 
00054     
00055    // initialize non-bonded structures
00056    for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _nonbonded.begin();
00057             iter != _nonbonded.end(); ++iter) {
00058         interaction_t *i = AddInteraction(*iter);
00059         i->_is_bonded = false;
00060     }
00061 
00062     // initialize non-bonded structures
00063    for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _bonded.begin();
00064         iter != _bonded.end(); ++iter) {
00065             interaction_t *i = AddInteraction(*iter);
00066             i->_is_bonded = true;
00067    }
00068    
00069    // initialize the group structures
00070     if(_do_imc)
00071         InitializeGroups();
00072 };
00073 
00074 void Imc::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom)
00075 {
00076   // we didn't process any frames so far
00077     _nframes = 0;
00078     _nblock = 0;
00079     _processed_some_frames=false;
00080 
00081     // initialize non-bonded structures
00082    for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _nonbonded.begin();
00083             iter != _nonbonded.end(); ++iter) {
00084         string name = (*iter)->get("name").value();
00085 
00086         interaction_t &i = *_interactions[name];
00087 
00088         // generate the bead lists
00089         BeadList beads1, beads2;
00090 
00091         beads1.Generate(*top, (*iter)->get("type1").value());
00092         beads2.Generate(*top, (*iter)->get("type2").value());
00093 
00094         if(beads1.size() == 0)
00095             throw std::runtime_error("Topology does not have beads of type \"" + (*iter)->get("type1").value() + "\"\n"
00096                     "This was specified in type1 of interaction \"" + name+ "\"");
00097         if(beads2.size() == 0)
00098             throw std::runtime_error("Topology does not have beads of type \"" + (*iter)->get("type2").value() + "\"\n"
00099                     "This was specified in type2 of interaction \"" + name + "\"");
00100         // calculate normalization factor for rdf
00101 
00102         if ((*iter)->get("type1").value() == (*iter)->get("type2").value())
00103             i._norm = 1. / (beads1.size()*(beads2.size()) / 2.);
00104         else
00105             i._norm = 1. / (beads1.size() * beads2.size());
00106     }
00107 
00108     for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _bonded.begin();
00109             iter != _bonded.end(); ++iter) {
00110         string name = (*iter)->get("name").value();
00111 
00112         std::list<Interaction *> list = top->InteractionsInGroup(name);
00113         if (list.empty() )
00114             throw std::runtime_error("Bonded interaction '" + name + "' defined in options xml-file, but not in topology - check name definition in the mapping file again");
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00118 // create an entry for interactions
00119 Imc::interaction_t *Imc::AddInteraction(Property *p)
00120 {
00121     string name = p->get("name").value();
00122     string group;
00123     if(_do_imc)
00124         group = p->get("inverse.imc.group").value();
00125     else
00126         group = "none";
00127     
00128     interaction_t *i = new interaction_t;
00129     i->_index = _interactions.size();
00130     _interactions[name] = i;
00131     getGroup(group)->_interactions.push_back(i);
00132     
00133     i->_step = p->get("step").as<double>();
00134     i->_min = p->get("min").as<double>();
00135     i->_max = p->get("max").as<double>();
00136     i->_norm = 1.0;
00137     i->_p=p;
00138     
00139     // initialize the current and average histogram
00140     int n = (int)((i->_max - i->_min) / i->_step + 1.000000001);
00141 
00142     i->_average.Initialize(i->_min, i->_max+i->_step, n);
00143     
00144     return i;
00145 }
00146 
00147 // end of trajectory, post processing data
00148 void Imc::EndEvaluate()
00149 {
00150     if(_nframes > 0) {
00151         if(_block_length == 0) {
00152             string suffix = string(".") + _extension;
00153             WriteDist(suffix);
00154             if(_do_imc)
00155                 WriteIMCData();
00156         }
00157     }
00158     // clear interactions and groups
00159     _interactions.clear();
00160     _groups.clear();
00161     if(!_processed_some_frames)
00162         throw std::runtime_error("no frames were processed. Please check your input");
00163 }

00165 // load options from xml file
00166 void Imc::LoadOptions(const string &file) {
00167     load_property_from_xml(_options, file);
00168     _bonded = _options.Select("cg.bonded");
00169     _nonbonded = _options.Select("cg.non-bonded");
00170         
00171 }
00172 
00173 // evaluate current conformation
00174 void Imc::Worker::EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom) {
00175     
00176     _cur_vol = top->BoxVolume();
00177     // process non-bonded interactions
00178     DoNonbonded(top);
00179     // process bonded interactions
00180     DoBonded(top);            
00181 }
00182 
00183 void Imc::ClearAverages()
00184 {
00185     map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00186     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00187     
00188     _nframes = 0;
00189     for (ic_iter = _interactions.begin(); ic_iter != _interactions.end(); ++ic_iter)
00190         ic_iter->second->_average.Clear();    
00191     
00192     for (group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter != _groups.end(); ++group_iter)
00193         group_iter->second->_corr.clear();      
00194 }

00196 class IMCNBSearchHandler {
00197 public:
00198     IMCNBSearchHandler(HistogramNew *hist)
00199             : _hist(hist) {}
00200 
00201     HistogramNew *_hist;
00202 
00203     bool FoundPair(Bead *b1, Bead *b2, const vec &r, const double dist) {
00204         _hist->Process(dist);
00205         return false;
00206     }
00207 };

00210 // process non-bonded interactions for current frame
00211 void Imc::Worker::DoNonbonded(Topology *top)
00212 {
00213     for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _imc->_nonbonded.begin();
00214             iter != _imc->_nonbonded.end(); ++iter) {
00215         string name = (*iter)->get("name").value();
00216         
00217         interaction_t &i = *_imc->_interactions[name];
00218         
00219         // generate the bead lists
00220         BeadList beads1, beads2;
00221         
00222         beads1.Generate(*top, (*iter)->get("type1").value());
00223         beads2.Generate(*top, (*iter)->get("type2").value());
00224                
00225         // generate the neighbour list
00226         NBList *nb;
00227 
00228         bool gridsearch=true;
00229 
00230         if(_imc->_options.exists("cg.nbsearch")) {
00231             if(_imc->_options.get("cg.nbsearch").as<string>() == "grid")
00232                 gridsearch=true;
00233             else if(_imc->_options.get("cg.nbsearch").as<string>() == "simple")
00234                 gridsearch=false;
00235             else throw std::runtime_error("cg.nbsearch invalid, can be grid or simple");
00236         }
00237         if(gridsearch)
00238             nb = new NBListGrid();
00239         else
00240             nb = new NBList();
00241 
00242         nb->setCutoff(i._max + i._step);
00243                 
00244         // clear the current histogram
00245         _current_hists[i._index].Clear();
00246 
00247         IMCNBSearchHandler h(&(_current_hists[i._index]));
00248 
00249         nb->SetMatchFunction(&h, &IMCNBSearchHandler::FoundPair);
00250 
00251         // is it same types or different types?
00252         if((*iter)->get("type1").value() == (*iter)->get("type2").value())
00253             nb->Generate(beads1);
00254         else
00255             nb->Generate(beads1, beads2);
00256 
00257         // process all pairs
00258         /*NBList::iterator pair_iter;
00259         for(pair_iter = nb->begin(); pair_iter!=nb->end();++pair_iter) {
00260                 _current_hists[i._index].Process((*pair_iter)->dist());
00261         }*/
00262 
00263         delete nb;
00264     }    
00265 }
00266 
00267 // process non-bonded interactions for current frame
00268 void Imc::Worker::DoBonded(Topology *top)
00269 {
00270     for (list<Property*>::iterator iter = _imc->_bonded.begin();
00271             iter != _imc->_bonded.end(); ++iter) {
00272         string name = (*iter)->get("name").value();
00273         
00274         interaction_t &i = *_imc->_interactions[name];
00275 
00276         // clear the current histogram
00277         _current_hists[i._index].Clear();
00278 
00279         // now fill with new data
00280         std::list<Interaction *> list = top->InteractionsInGroup(name);
00281 
00282         std::list<Interaction *>::iterator ic_iter;
00283         for(ic_iter=list.begin(); ic_iter!=list.end(); ++ic_iter) {
00284             Interaction *ic = *ic_iter;
00285             double v = ic->EvaluateVar(*top);
00286             _current_hists[i._index].Process(v);
00287         }
00288     }    
00289 }
00290 
00291 // returns a group, creates it if doesn't exist
00292 Imc::group_t *Imc::getGroup(const string &name)
00293 {
00294     map<string, group_t *>::iterator iter;
00295     iter = _groups.find(name);
00296     if(iter == _groups.end()) {
00297         return _groups[name] = new group_t;
00298     }
00299     return (*iter).second;
00300 }
00301 
00302 // initialize the groups after interactions are added
00303 void Imc::InitializeGroups()
00304 {
00305     if(!_do_imc) return;
00306     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00307 
00308     // clear all the pairs
00309     
00310     // iterator over all groups
00311     for (group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter != _groups.end(); ++group_iter) {
00312         group_t *grp = (*group_iter).second;      
00313         grp->_pairs.clear();
00314     
00315         int n = 0;
00316         // count number of bins needed in matrix
00317         for (list<interaction_t*>::iterator i1 = grp->_interactions.begin();
00318                 i1 != grp->_interactions.end(); ++i1)
00319             n+=(*i1)->_average.getNBins();
00320     
00321         // handy access to matrix
00322         group_matrix &M = grp->_corr;
00323         
00324         // initialize matrix with zeroes
00325         M.resize(n,n);
00326         M = ub::zero_matrix<double>(n, n);
00327         
00328         // now create references to the sub matrices
00329         int i, j;
00330         i=0;j=0;
00331         // iterate over all possible compinations of pairs
00332         for (list<interaction_t*>::iterator i1 = grp->_interactions.begin();
00333                 i1 != grp->_interactions.end(); ++i1) {
00334             int n1 = (*i1)->_average.getNBins();
00335             j = i;
00336             for (list<interaction_t*>::iterator i2 = i1;
00337                     i2 != grp->_interactions.end(); ++i2) {
00338                 int n2 = (*i2)->_average.getNBins();
00339                 
00340                 // create matrix proxy with sub-matrix
00341                 pair_matrix corr(M, ub::range(i, i+n1), ub::range(j, j+n2));
00342                 // add the pair
00343                 grp->_pairs.push_back(pair_t(*i1, *i2, i, j, corr));
00344                 j+=n2;
00345             }
00346             i+=n1;
00347         }
00348     }
00349 }
00350 
00351 // update the correlation matrix
00352 void Imc::DoCorrelations(Imc::Worker *worker) {
00353     if(!_do_imc) return;
00354     vector<pair_t>::iterator pair;
00355     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00356         
00357      for (group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter != _groups.end(); ++group_iter) {
00358         group_t *grp = (*group_iter).second;      
00359         // update correlation for all pairs
00360         for (pair = grp->_pairs.begin(); pair != grp->_pairs.end(); ++pair) {
00361             ub::vector<double> &a = worker->_current_hists[pair->_i1->_index].data().y();
00362             ub::vector<double> &b = worker->_current_hists[pair->_i2->_index].data().y();
00363             pair_matrix &M = pair->_corr;
00364 
00365             // M_ij += a_i*b_j
00366             //for(int i=0; i<M.size1(); ++i)
00367             //    for(int j=i; j<M.size2(); ++j)
00368             //        M(i,j) = ((((double)_nframes-1.0)*M(i,j)) + (a(i)*b(j)))/(double)_nframes;
00369             M = ((((double)_nframes-1.0)*M) + ub::outer_prod(a, b))/(double)_nframes;
00370         }
00371     }
00372 }
00373 
00374 // write the distribution function
00375 void Imc::WriteDist(const string &suffix)
00376 {
00377     map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator iter;
00378 
00379     // for all interactions
00380     for (iter = _interactions.begin(); iter != _interactions.end(); ++iter) {            
00381         // calculate the rdf
00382         Table &t = iter->second->_average.data();            
00383         Table dist(t);
00384         if(!iter->second->_is_bonded) {
00385             // normalization is calculated using exact shell volume (difference of spheres)
00386             for(int i=0; i<dist.y().size(); ++i) {
00387                 double x1 = dist.x()[i] - 0.5*iter->second->_step;
00388                 double x2 = x1 + iter->second->_step;
00389                 if(x1<0) {
00390                     dist.y()[i]=0;
00391                 }
00392                 else {
00393                     dist.y()[i] = _avg_vol.getAvg()*iter->second->_norm *
00394                         dist.y()[i]/(4./3.*M_PI*(x2*x2*x2 - x1*x1*x1));                
00395                 }
00396             }
00397         }
00398         else {
00399             dist.y() = iter->second->_norm * dist.y();
00400         }
00401         
00402         dist.Save((iter->first) + suffix);
00403         cout << "written " << (iter->first) + suffix << "\n";
00404     }
00405 }
00406 
00407 
00414 void Imc::WriteIMCData(const string &suffix) {            
00415     if(!_do_imc) return;
00416     //map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00417     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00418     
00419     // iterate over all groups
00420     for(group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter!=_groups.end(); ++group_iter) {
00421         group_t *grp = (*group_iter).second;    
00422         string grp_name = (*group_iter).first;
00423         list<interaction_t *>::iterator iter;
00424         
00425         // number of total bins for all interactions in group is matrix dimension
00426         int n=grp->_corr.size1();
00427                 
00428         // build full set of equations + copy some data to make
00429         // code better to read
00430         group_matrix gmc(grp->_corr);
00431         ub::vector<double> dS(n);
00432         ub::vector<double> r(n);
00433         // the next two variables are to later extract the individual parts
00434         // from the whole data after solving equations
00435         vector<RangeParser> ranges; // sizes of the individual interactions
00436         vector<string> names; // names of the interactions
00437                         
00438         // copy all averages+r of group to one vector
00439         n=0;
00440         int begin=1;
00441         for(iter=grp->_interactions.begin(); iter != grp->_interactions.end(); ++iter) {
00442             interaction_t *ic = *iter;
00443             
00444             // sub vector for dS
00445             ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > sub_dS(dS, 
00446                     ub::range(n, n + ic->_average.getNBins()));
00447             
00448             // sub vector for r
00449             ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > sub_r(r, 
00450                     ub::range(n, n + ic->_average.getNBins()));
00451             
00452             // read in target and calculate dS
00453             CalcDeltaS(ic, sub_dS);
00454             
00455             // copy r
00456             sub_r = ic->_average.data().x();
00457             
00458             // save size
00459 
00460             RangeParser rp;
00461             int end = begin  + ic->_average.getNBins() -1;
00462             rp.Add(begin, end);
00463             ranges.push_back(rp);
00464             begin = end+1;
00465             // save name
00466             names.push_back(ic->_p->get("name").as<string>());
00467             
00468             // shift subrange by size of current
00469             n+=ic->_average.getNBins();
00470         }
00471         
00472         // now we need to calculate the 
00473         // A_ij = <S_i*S_j> - <S_i>*<S_j>        
00474         vector<pair_t>::iterator pair;
00475         for (pair = grp->_pairs.begin(); pair != grp->_pairs.end(); ++pair) {
00476             interaction_t *i1 = pair->_i1;
00477             interaction_t *i2 = pair->_i2;
00478             
00479             // make reference to <S_i>
00480             ub::vector<double> &a = i1->_average.data().y();
00481             // make reference to <S_j>
00482             ub::vector<double> &b = i2->_average.data().y();
00483             
00484             int i=pair->_offset_i;
00485             int j=pair->_offset_j;
00486             int n1=i1->_average.getNBins();
00487             int n2=i2->_average.getNBins();
00488             
00489             // sub matrix for these two interactions
00490             // we only need to take care about one sub-matrix and not the mirrored
00491             // one since ublas makes sure the matrix is symmetric
00492             pair_matrix M(gmc, ub::range(i, i+n1),
00493                                ub::range(j, j+n2));
00494             // A_ij = -(<a_i*a_j>  - <a_i>*<b_j>)
00495             //for(i=0; i<M.size1(); ++i)
00496             //    for(j=i; j<M.size2(); ++j)
00497             //        M(i,j) = -(M(i,j) - a(i)*b(j));
00498             M = -(M - ub::outer_prod(a, b));
00499         }
00500         
00501         imcio_write_dS(grp_name + suffix + ".imc", r, dS);
00502         imcio_write_matrix(grp_name + suffix + ".gmc", gmc);
00503         imcio_write_index(grp_name + suffix + ".idx", names, ranges);
00504 
00505     }
00506 }
00507 
00508 // calculate deviation from target vectors
00509 void Imc::CalcDeltaS(interaction_t *interaction, ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > &dS)
00510 {
00511     const string &name = interaction->_p->get("name").as<string>();
00512                 
00513     Table target;
00514     target.Load(name + ".dist.tgt");
00515 
00516     if(!interaction->_is_bonded) {
00517         for(int i=0; i<target.y().size(); ++i) {
00518             double x1 = target.x()[i] - 0.5*interaction->_step;
00519             double x2 = x1 + interaction->_step;
00520             if(x1<0)
00521                 x1=x2=0;
00522             target.y()[i] = 1./(_avg_vol.getAvg()*interaction->_norm) *
00523                 target.y()[i] * (4./3.*M_PI*(x2*x2*x2 - x1*x1*x1));                
00524         }        
00525     }
00526     else {
00527             target.y() = (1.0 / interaction->_norm)*target.y();
00528     }
00529     if(target.y().size() !=  interaction->_average.data().y().size())
00530         throw std::runtime_error("number of grid points in target does not match the grid");
00531 
00532     dS = interaction->_average.data().y() - target.y();
00533 }
00534 
00535 
00536 void Imc::WriteIMCBlock(const string &suffix)
00537 {
00538     if(!_do_imc) return;
00539     //map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00540     map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00541 
00542     // iterate over all groups
00543     for(group_iter = _groups.begin(); group_iter!=_groups.end(); ++group_iter) {
00544         group_t *grp = (*group_iter).second;
00545         string grp_name = (*group_iter).first;
00546         list<interaction_t *>::iterator iter;
00547 
00548         // number of total bins for all interactions in group is matrix dimension
00549         int n=grp->_corr.size1();
00550 
00551         // build full set of equations + copy some data to make
00552         // code better to read
00553         group_matrix gmc(grp->_corr);
00554         ub::vector<double> dS(n);
00555         ub::vector<double> r(n);
00556         // the next two variables are to later extract the individual parts
00557         // from the whole data after solving equations
00558         vector<int> sizes; // sizes of the individual interactions
00559         vector<string> names; // names of the interactions
00560 
00561         // copy all averages+r of group to one vector
00562         n=0;
00563         for(iter=grp->_interactions.begin(); iter != grp->_interactions.end(); ++iter) {
00564             interaction_t *ic = *iter;
00565 
00566             // sub vector for dS
00567             ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > sub_dS(dS,
00568                     ub::range(n, n + ic->_average.getNBins()));
00569 
00570             // sub vector for r
00571             ub::vector_range< ub::vector<double> > sub_r(r,
00572                     ub::range(n, n + ic->_average.getNBins()));
00573 
00574             // read in target and calculate dS
00575             sub_dS = ic->_average.data().y();
00576             // copy r
00577             sub_r = ic->_average.data().x();
00578             // save size
00579             sizes.push_back(ic->_average.getNBins());
00580             // save name
00581             names.push_back(ic->_p->get("name").as<string>());
00582 
00583             // shift subrange by size of current
00584             n+=ic->_average.getNBins();
00585         }
00586 
00587         // write the dS
00588         ofstream out_dS;
00589         string name_dS = grp_name + suffix + ".S";
00590         out_dS.open(name_dS.c_str());
00591         out_dS << setprecision(8);
00592         if(!out_dS)
00593             throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + name_dS);
00594 
00595         for(size_t i=0; i<dS.size(); ++i) {
00596             out_dS << r[i] << " " << dS[i] << endl;
00597         }
00598 
00599         out_dS.close();
00600         cout << "written " << name_dS << endl;
00601 
00602         // write the correlations
00603         ofstream out_cor;
00604         string name_cor = grp_name + suffix + ".cor";
00605         out_cor.open(name_cor.c_str());
00606         out_cor << setprecision(8);
00607 
00608         if(!out_cor)
00609             throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + name_cor);
00610 
00611         for(group_matrix::size_type i=0; i<grp->_corr.size1(); ++i) {
00612             for(group_matrix::size_type j=0; j<grp->_corr.size2(); ++j) {
00613                 out_cor << grp->_corr(i, j) << " ";
00614             }
00615             out_cor << endl;
00616         }
00617         out_cor.close();
00618         cout << "written " << name_cor << endl;
00619     }
00620 }
00621 
00622 CsgApplication::Worker *Imc::ForkWorker()
00623 {
00624     Imc::Worker *worker;
00625     worker = new Imc::Worker;
00626     map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00627 
00628     worker->_current_hists.resize(_interactions.size());
00629     worker->_imc = this;
00630 
00631     for (ic_iter = _interactions.begin(); ic_iter != _interactions.end(); ++ic_iter) {
00632         interaction_t *i = ic_iter->second;
00633         worker->_current_hists[i->_index].Initialize(
00634         i->_average.getMin(),
00635         i->_average.getMax(),
00636         i->_average.getNBins());
00637     }
00638     return worker;
00639 }
00640 
00641 void Imc::MergeWorker(CsgApplication::Worker* worker_)
00642 {
00643     _processed_some_frames = true;
00644     Imc::Worker *worker = dynamic_cast<Imc::Worker *>(worker_);
00645         // update the average
00646     map<string, interaction_t *>::iterator ic_iter;
00647     //map<string, group_t *>::iterator group_iter;
00648 
00649     ++_nframes;
00650     _avg_vol.Process(worker->_cur_vol);
00651     for (ic_iter = _interactions.begin(); ic_iter != _interactions.end(); ++ic_iter) {
00652         interaction_t *i=ic_iter->second;
00653         i->_average.data().y() = (((double)_nframes-1.0)*i->_average.data().y()
00654             + worker->_current_hists[i->_index].data().y())/(double)_nframes;
00655     }
00656 
00657         // update correlation matrices
00658     if(_do_imc)
00659         DoCorrelations(worker);
00660 
00661     if(_block_length != 0) {
00662         if((_nframes % _block_length)==0) {
00663             _nblock++;
00664             string suffix = string("_") + boost::lexical_cast<string>(_nblock) + string(".") + _extension;
00665             WriteDist(suffix);
00666             WriteIMCData(suffix);
00667             WriteIMCBlock(suffix);
00668             ClearAverages();
00669         }
00670     }
00671 
00672 }
00673 
00674 }}
